name: animate_image
description: Animate static images into videos using Veo 2 or Veo 3

camera_movement: Camera pans from left to right
Camera pulls back revealing more of the scene
subject_action: subtle movement brings the scene to life
the scene transitions from day to night

image_requirements.resolution: Any resolution and aspect ratio supported
image_requirements.recommendation: Use high-quality images for best results

examples.prompt: Camera slowly zooms in while the subject turns their head, creating a cinematic feel
Camera pans from left to right while wind creates gentle motion, with smooth professional motion

notes: Supports images up to 20MB in size
Can generate up to 2 videos per request
Image is used as the first frame of the video
For audio, upgrade to Veo 3 model
